author: cms-sw
body:
While working on another PR, I have noticed unexpected differences in load-bot-cache actions. After quick investigation I have discovered that `load-bot-cache` action is not recorded properly - the recorded cache contents did not match data found in comment)s_ recorded in `ReplayData/<name>.txt` file. This was because I stored a reference to cache in `actions` list.

This PR fixes this, and adds a script to verify that loaded cache in PRActionData matches cache in issue comments in ReplayData.
title: Fix recording load-bot-cache action
